name: Sleep Dealer
summary_text: The near future. Like tomorrow. In a world marked by closed borders, corporate warriors, and a global computer network, three strangers risk their lives to connect, break through the barriers of technology, and unseal their fates.

name: Kakushi ken oni no tsume
summary_text: A 19th Century samurai, held in low esteem due to an action by his late father, must resolve his history with a maid and with his close friend.

name: Giant Little Ones
summary_text: Two popular teen boys, best friends since childhood, discover their lives, families, and girlfriends dramatically upended after an unexpected incident occurs on the night of a 17th birthday party.

name: I Wish
summary_text: Twelve-year-old Koichi, who has been separated from his brother Ryunosuke due to his parents' divorce, hears a rumor that the new bullet trains will precipitate a wish-granting miracle when they pass each other at top speed.

name: Eros
summary_text: Three short films, one each from Directors Michelangelo Antonioni, Steven Soderbergh, and Wong Kar Wai, address the themes of love and sex.

name: Scorched
summary_text: By chance 3 employees rob their bank the same weekend.

name: About Adam
summary_text: A waitress falls for a handsome customer who seduces her, her two sisters, her brother, and her brother's girlfriend.

name: Mio fratello è figlio unico
summary_text: Two brothers come of age in a small Italian town in the '60s and '70s.

name: Two Evil Eyes
summary_text: Two horror tales based on short stories by Edgar Allan Poe, directed by famed horror directors George A. Romero and Dario Argento. A greedy wife kills her husband, but not completely; a sleazy reporter adopts a strange black cat.

name: Fasle kargadan
summary_text: Kurdish-Iranian poet Sahel has just been released from a thirty-year prison sentence in Iran. Now the one thing keeping him going is the thought of finding his wife, who thinks him dead for over twenty years.

name: The Lift
summary_text: A lift technician finds himself drawn into a web of mystery and peril as he investigates the perplexing deadly accidents occurring in the elevators of a new office building.

name: Beyond the Law
summary_text: An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars.

name: Lady in White
summary_text: An author tells the story of how, as a young boy growing up in a 1960s small town, he was haunted after witnessing the murder of a little girl.

name: Spider Baby or, the Maddest Story Ever Told
summary_text: A caretaker devotes himself to three demented siblings after their father's death.

name: Baar Baar Dekho
summary_text: The highs and lows of a romantic relationship are examined through flashbacks and flash-forwards.

name: A Night in Casablanca
summary_text: The Marx Brothers are employed at a hotel in postwar Casablanca, where a ring of Nazis is trying to recover a cache of stolen treasure.

name: The Song of Bernadette
summary_text: A young girl claims to have seen a divine vision, which prompts both a religious phenomenon and extreme skepticism.

name: The Answer Man
summary_text: A reclusive author of spiritual books is pursued for advice by a single mother and a man fresh out of rehab.

name: Operation Red Sea
summary_text: PLA Navy Marine Corps launch a hostage rescue operation in the fictional Republic of Ihwea and undergo a fierce battle with rebellions and terrorism.

name: Fear Clinic
summary_text: A doctor works to cure patients suffering from crippling phobias by placing them inside his invention, which induces and controls hallucinations.

name: Today's Special
summary_text: In this super-feel-good foodie comedy, young Manhattan chef Samir rediscovers his heritage and his passion for life through the enchanting art of cooking Indian food.

name: See No Evil 2
summary_text: An undertaker's birthday party is interrupted when Jacob Goodnight rises from the dead and proceeds to terrorize her and her friends.

name: Portrait of Jennie
summary_text: A mysterious girl inspires a struggling artist.

name: Breach
summary_text: On the cusp of fatherhood, a junior mechanic aboard an interstellar ark to New Earth must outwit a malevolent cosmic terror intent on using the spaceship as a weapon.

name: Shikara
summary_text: Shikara is the story of resilience in the face of insurmountable odds. It's also the story of a love that remains unextinguished through 30 years of exile. A timeless love story in the worst of times.

name: Halloweentown High
summary_text: A girl in a magical world bets her family's magic that nothing bad will happen when kids from Halloweentown attend high school in the mortal realm.

name: Nirvana
summary_text: The main character Solo in Nirvana, a computer game developed by Jimi for release in 3 days, has gained self-awareness after a virus attack. Solo wants to be deleted. Jimi wants to find his ex.

name: Extreme Prejudice
summary_text: A Texas Ranger and a ruthless narcotics kingpin - they were childhood friends, now they are adversaries...

name: The Adventure of Sherlock Holmes' Smarter Brother
summary_text: The younger brother of the consulting detective tries to steal Sherlock's glory by solving an important case assisted by an eccentric Scotland Yard detective and a lovely but suspicious actress.

name: March of the Wooden Soldiers
summary_text: Opposing the evil Barnaby, Ollie Dee and Stanley Dum try and fail to pay-off Mother Peep's mortgage and mislead his attempts to marry Little Bo. Enraged, Barnaby's Bogeymen are set on Toyland.

name: The Moth Diaries
summary_text: Rebecca is suspicious of Ernessa, the new arrival at her boarding school. But is Rebecca just jealous of Ernessa's bond with Lucie, or does the new girl truly possess a dark secret?

name: Uçurtmayi Vurmasinlar
summary_text: Baris, a 5 year-old little boy, has to stay in a prison with her mother during her detention period. Baris develops a special relationship with Inci, a young woman who also stays in prison. She promises him that the kite will fly someday.

name: Fantômas contre Scotland Yard
summary_text: Famous but unlucky pursuers of Fantomas from France go to weird Scotland for a final attempt to bring the impudent criminal to justice.

name: Chris Rock: Tamborine
summary_text: Chris Rock takes the stage in Brooklyn for a comedy special filled with searing observations on fatherhood, infidelity and American politics.

name: Lipstick Under My Burkha
summary_text: In order to be independent and break free from the conservative society, four women sets on a journey to discover freedom and happiness.

name: Kiler
summary_text: An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs.

name: Camille Claudel
summary_text: Camille Claude impresses already-famous sculptor Auguste Rodin. He hires her as an assistant, but soon Camille begins to sculpt for herself and she also becomes his mistress. But after a while, she would like to get out of his shadow.

name: The Fugitives
summary_text: Jean is taken hostage at a bank by a foolish bank robber. As Jean left prison an hour earlier, the police assume he's the robber. Everything goes comically wrong. The robber's little daughter joins the fugitives.

name: Jack and the Cuckoo-Clock Heart
summary_text: A 19th-century drama about a man whose heart was replaced with a clock when he was born. The situation dictates that he should avoid feeling strong emotions -- love, most of all -- but he just can't keep his feelings under wraps.

name: Love on the Run
summary_text: Antoine Doinel is now more than thirty. He divorces from Christine. He is a proofreader, and is in love with Sabine, a record seller. Colette, his teenager love, is now a lawyer. She buys ...                See full summary »

name: The Man Who Loved Women
summary_text: Bertrand Morane's burial is attended by all the women the forty-year-old engineer loved. We then flash back to Bertrand's life and love affairs, told by himself while writing an ...                See full summary »

name: Cairo Time
summary_text: A romantic drama about a brief, unexpected love affair that catches two people completely off-guard.

name: Leto
summary_text: A love triangle emerges around a rock and roll musician, his protege and his wife in 1980s Russia.

name: The Accidental Prime Minister
summary_text: Explores Manmohan Singh's tenure as the Prime Minister of India and the kind of control he had over the cabinet and the country.

name: Suntan
summary_text: On a hedonistic Greek island, a middle-aged doctor becomes obsessed with a young tourist when she lets him tag along with her group of hard partying friends.

name: A Summer in Genoa
summary_text: A man moves his two daughters to Italy after their mother dies in a car accident, in order to revitalize their lives. Genova changes all three of them as the youngest daughter starts to see the ghost of her mother, while the older one discovers her sexuality.

name: Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?
summary_text: Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis. The four spouses of their daughters, David, Rachid, Chao and Charles decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they are imagining their lives elsewhere.

name: Charly
summary_text: An intellectually disabled man undergoes an experiment that gives him the intelligence of a genius.

name: Trauma Center
summary_text: Alone and trapped in a locked-down hospital, an injured young woman must escape a pair of vicious killers who are after the only piece of evidence that can implicate them in a grisly murder, the bullet in her leg.

name: Senso
summary_text: An Italian Countess is allied with Nationalists during the Italian-Austrian war of unification. However, she risks betraying their cause when she falls in love with an Austrian Lieutenant.

name: Zavet
summary_text: A grandson gives his grandfather a vow to go to the city to sell a cow and bring back a wife.

name: Proof
summary_text: The life of a blind photographer who is looked after by a housekeeper is disrupted by the arrival of an agreeable restaurant worker.

name: The Festival
summary_text: After Nick's girlfriend dumps him, his best mate Shane has the perfect antidote to his break-up blues: three days at an epic music festival.

name: Japanese Story
summary_text: Against the background of an Australian desert, Sandy, a geologist, and Hiromitsu, a Japanese businessman, play out a story of human inconsequence in the face of the blistering universe. ...                See full summary »

name: Memories
summary_text: Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.

name: Mon meilleur ami
summary_text: Catherine, refuses to believe that her business partner, the unlikeable François, has a best friend, so she challenges him to set up an introduction. Scrambling to find someone willing to pose as his best pal, François enlists the services of a charming taxi driver to play the part.

name: Nerkonda Paarvai
summary_text: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

name: Inhale
summary_text: A couple goes to dangerous lengths to find a lung donor for their daughter.

name: Rampage: Capital Punishment
summary_text: A man takes over a TV station and holds a number of hostages as a political platform to awaken humanity, instead of money.

name: Dear Comrade
summary_text: A hot-blooded student union leader falls for a state-level cricketer but his anger management issues and violent streak threatens to derail their love story.

name: Caesar Must Die
summary_text: Inmates at a high-security prison in Rome prepare for a public performance of Shakespeare's "Julius Caesar."

name: En kärlekshistoria
summary_text: Two teenagers fall in love over the summer, in spite of cynical and disapproving adults who dismiss their relationship as being nothing but young love.

name: Brighton Rock
summary_text: Charts the headlong fall of Pinkie, a razor-wielding disadvantaged teenager with a religious death wish.

name: Dodes'ka-den
summary_text: Various tales in the lives of Tokyo slum dwellers, including a mentally deficient young man obsessed with driving his own commuter trolley.

name: The Woman in the Fifth
summary_text: A college lecturer flees to Paris after a scandal costs him his job. In the City of Light, he meets a widow who might be involved in a series of murders.

name: Botched
summary_text: During a heist in Russia, a professional thief finds himself dealing with serial killers, insane hostages, double-crossing psycho Russian hardmen and the real possibility of a horrible death.

name: A Troll in Central Park
summary_text: An evil Queen banishes a flower loving troll named Stanley (Dom DeLuise) to New York City, where he befriends two young children.

name: Thunder and the House of Magic
summary_text: Thunder, an abandoned young cat seeking shelter from a storm, stumbles into the strangest house imaginable, owned by an old magician and inhabited by a dazzling array of automatons and gizmos.

name: Let's Be Evil
summary_text: A vision of augmented reality.

name: Q
summary_text: In a social context deteriorated by a countrywide economic crisis, the life of several people will be turned upside down after they meet Cecile, a character who symbolizes desire.

name: Listen Up Philip
summary_text: When a self-obsessed novelist (Jason Schwartzman) has problems with his novel and his girlfriend (Elisabeth Moss), he seeks refuge in his mentor's cottage where the peace and quiet allow him to focus on his favorite subject - himself.

name: Pariah
summary_text: A Brooklyn teenager juggles conflicting identities and risks friendship, heartbreak, and family in a desperate search for sexual expression.

name: The Company
summary_text: Ensemble drama centered around a group of ballet dancers, with a focus on one young dancer who's poised to become a principal performer.

name: Le Bonheur
summary_text: François, a young carpenter, lives a happy, uncomplicated life with his wife Thérèse and their two small children. One day he meets Emilie, a clerk in the local post office.

name: Stand by Me Doraemon
summary_text: What will happen to Nobita's life after Doraemon leaves?

name: The Haunted Palace
summary_text: Charles Dexter Ward arrives at a small village to visit the house he inherited from his ancestor who died there 100 years ago.

name: Grbavica: The Land of My Dreams
summary_text: A woman and her daughter struggle to make their way through the aftermath of the Bosnian War.

name: Spielberg
summary_text: A documentary on Steven Spielberg, filmmaker. Includes interviews with relatives, film critics, peers and people who have worked with him.

name: Welcome Home
summary_text: A couple spend a weekend at a vacation rental home in the Italian countryside in an attempt to repair their relationship, but soon become victims of the homeowner's sinister plans.

name: Melissa P.
summary_text: An adolescent girl, living with her mother and her grandmother, will have her first sexual experiences in a heavy and excessive way.

name: Papanasam
summary_text: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: The Debt Collector
summary_text: A classically-trained martial artist goes to work as a mob debt collector. The job seems easy enough, until a client drags him into a situation deeper than could ever be anticipated.

name: Shadows of Forgotten Ancestors
summary_text: A timeless Carpathian story - the young Ivan falls in love with the daughter of his father's killer among the Hutsul people of Ukraine.

name: I'm No Longer Here
summary_text: In Monterrey, Mexico, a young street gang spends their days dancing to slowed-down cumbia and attending parties. After a mix-up with a local cartel, their leader is forced to migrate to the U.S. but quickly longs to return home.

name: Pocketful of Miracles
summary_text: A New York gangster and his girlfriend attempt to turn street beggar Apple Annie into a society lady when the peddler learns her daughter is marrying royalty.

name: Quien a hierro mata
summary_text: A drug dealer looking for rest. A nurse looking for revenge. A crossroads where no one is safe.

name: Paterno
summary_text: Penn State football coach Joe Paterno becomes embroiled in a sexual abuse scandal.

name: When the Bough Breaks
summary_text: A surrogate mom for a couple becomes dangerously obsessed with the soon-to-be father.

name: Ne Zha
summary_text: Born with unique powers, a boy is recruited to fight demons and save the community that fears him.

name: The White Countess
summary_text: Set in 1930s Shanghai, where a blind American diplomat develops a curious relationship with a young Russian refugee who works odd -- and sometimes illicit -- jobs to support members of her dead husband's aristocratic family.

name: The Big Parade
summary_text: A young American soldier witnesses the horrors of the Great War.

name: Bogus
summary_text: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.

name: The Garden of the Finzi-Continis
summary_text: The story of the Finzi-Continis, a noble family of Ferrara, during the Jewish persecution in Italy's 1930s.

name: Almost Christmas
summary_text: A dysfunctional family gathers together for their first Christmas since their mom died.

name: Reprisal
summary_text: A bank manager haunted by a violent heist that took the life of a coworker teams up with his ex-cop neighbor to bring down the assailant, initiating an explosive counterattack that brings all three men to the breaking point.

name: The Falling
summary_text: It's 1969 at a strict English girls' school where charismatic Abbie and intense and troubled Lydia are best friends. After a tragedy occurs at the school, a mysterious fainting epidemic breaks out threatening the stability of all involved.

name: An Innocent Man
summary_text: A man is framed by two corrupt cops for drugs. After he gets out of prison, he comes after them.

name: Haunted
summary_text: A skeptical professor visits a remote British estate to debunk allegations of psychic phenomena, but soon finds himself haunted by a ghost from his own past.

name: Fuk sau
summary_text: A French chef swears revenge after a violent attack on his daughter's family in Macau, during which her husband and her two children are murdered. To help him find the killers, he hires three local hit-men working for the mafia.

name: Kandisha
summary_text: Shattered by the loss of her child, Nyla Jayde, a brilliant criminal defense attorney, takes on a case involving a 14th century Moroccan legend, a vengeful spirit named "Kandisha".

name: Levity
summary_text: After two decades in prison for murder, a man is released on parole and returns to his hometown seeking redemption.

name: Boiling Point
summary_text: Two disquieted junior baseball players seek revenge on the local yakuza for attacking their coach.

name: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
summary_text: A historic chronicle based on the book by Dee Brown explains how Native Americans were displaced as the United States expanded west.

name: Profesionalac
summary_text: After the collapse of the Yugoslavian government, a former secret agent, now a taxi driver, enters the office of a former university professor, now a firm director.

name: Burnt Money
summary_text: Nene & Angel and their accomplice Cuervo participate in a botched bank robbery in 1965 Buenos Aires, then hide out from the police in Uruguay while the gang breaks down.

name: Jawaani Jaaneman
summary_text: A 40 year-old playboy's life turns upside down when he comes to know that he has a 20 something year-old daughter.

name: Pride
summary_text: The determined Jim Ellis starts a swim team for troubled teens at the Philadelphia Department of Recreation.

name: The Laramie Project
summary_text: The true story of an American town in the wake of the murder of Matthew Shepard.

name: Firewalker
summary_text: A pair of adventurers try to track down an ancient Aztec/Mayan/Egyptian/Apache hoard of gold.

name: Bloodline
summary_text: Evan values family above all else, and anyone who gets between him, his wife, and newborn son learns that the hard way. But when it comes to violent tendencies, it seems the apple doesn't fall far from the tree.

name: After Lucia
summary_text: Alejandra and her dad Roberto have just moved to town. She is new at school, he has a new job. Starting over is sometimes complicated when you have left so much behind.

name: Funeral in Berlin
summary_text: A British Agent is sent to East Berlin to receive a Communist defector, but the true situation turns out to be rather more complicated.

name: Kansas City Confidential
summary_text: An ex-con trying to go straight is framed for a million dollar armored car robbery and must go to Mexico in order to unmask the real culprits.

name: Life of a King
summary_text: Ex-felon, Eugene Brown, establishes a Chess Club for inner city teenagers in Washington, D.C.

name: Lost & Found
summary_text: In order to impress his beautiful French neighbor, Dylan Ramsey dognaps her pet pooch so he can return him and become a hero. Unfortunately, things do not work out as planned.

name: Robinson Crusoe on Mars
summary_text: Stranded on Mars with only a monkey as a companion, an astronaut must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet.

name: Freaky Deaky
summary_text: Set in 1974, a pair of '60s radicals rely on their bomb-making skills on their way to becoming capitalists.

name: The Offence
summary_text: A burnt-out British police detective finally snaps whilst interrogating a suspected child molester.

name: Aligarh
summary_text: A gay, linguistic professor living in a small orthodox city must deal with the aftermath of a sting operation that puts his sexual orientation in front of the entire nation.

name: Won't Back Down
summary_text: Two determined mothers­, one a teacher, look to transform their children's failing inner city school. Facing a powerful and entrenched bureaucracy, they risk everything to make a difference in the education and future of their children.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Super Android 13
summary_text: The death of Dr. Gero at the hands of Androids 17 and 18 prompts the activation of Androids 13, 14, and 15. They try to kill Goku, who fights them with the help of Trunks, Piccolo, Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan.

name: Urge
summary_text: A weekend getaway takes a dangerous turn when a mysterious nightclub owner introduces a group of friends to a dangerous new designer drug.

name: My All-American
summary_text: Freddie Steinmark, an underdog on the gridiron, faces the toughest challenge of his life after leading his team to a championship season.

name: Johnny Be Good
summary_text: Johnny's the top high-school football player and many colleges want him. His girlfriend, coach and best friend want him in the college, serving themselves most.

name: Viy
summary_text: A young priest is ordered to preside over the wake of witch in a small old wooden church of a remote village. This means spending three nights alone with the corpse with only his faith to protect him.

name: That Darn Cat!
summary_text: After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an S.O.S., the F.B.I. assigns a cat-allergic Agent to the case.

name: Let the Sunshine In
summary_text: Isabelle, Parisian artist, divorced mother, is looking for love, true love at last.

name: The Unsaid
summary_text: A seemingly-untroubled adolescent carries disturbing secrets that compel a psychiatrist to unearth the patient's gruesome past.

name: Little Joe
summary_text: Alice, a single mother, is a dedicated senior plant breeder at a corporation engaged in developing new species. Against company policy, she takes one home as a gift for her teenage son and names it after him but soon starts fearing it.

name: Reefer Madness: The Movie Musical
summary_text: An outrageous tongue-in-cheek musical comedy adaptation of the classic anti-marijuana propaganda film Reefer Madness (1936).

name: Deewana
summary_text: A singer (Rishi Kapoor) marries his biggest fan, but his uncle (Amrish Puri) plans to kill him in order to gain his money.

name: Big Wednesday
summary_text: The lives of some California surfers from the early 1960s to the 1970s.

name: Satyameva Jayate
summary_text: An honest cop attempts to hunt down a vigilante who kills corrupt cops by setting them on fire.

name: The Vault
summary_text: Follows a genius engineering graduate who is interested in the Bank of Spain's safe.

name: The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
summary_text: Ancient mysteries. Powerful evil. And a fearless hero's quest through a fantastical realm of steam-powered wonders and sinister magic...

name: Sayonara
summary_text: A US Air Force major in Kobe confronts his own opposition to marriages between American servicemen and Japanese women when he falls for a beautiful performer.

name: Penny Dreadful
summary_text: Young Penny goes on a retreat with her psychologist; the intention is to help her overcome her phobia, an intense fear of cars. Unexpected events find her in a nightmarish situation where her worst fears come true.

name: The Toxic Avenger Part II
summary_text: The Toxic Avenger is tricked into traveling to Tokyo to search for his estranged father, leaving Tromaville open to complete domination by an evil corporation.

name: House of Frankenstein
summary_text: A deranged scientist escapes from prison and recruits Dracula, Frankenstein and the Wolf Man to get revenge on his behalf.

name: Lady Jane
summary_text: The story of Lady Jane Grey, who was Queen of England for only nine days.

name: The Brothers Lionheart
summary_text: Brothers Jonatan and Skorpan lead a revolution against the tyrant Tengil in the magical afterlife land of Nangijala.

name: Head Full of Honey
summary_text: Before Tilda's parents can put her beloved grandfather in an old people's home due to his progressing Alzheimer disease, she takes him on one last adventure that subliminally threatens to tear her family apart.

name: Mad Love
summary_text: The wild and sexy story of two passionate young people who take to the road for the incredible adventure of their lives.

name: Sentinelle
summary_text: Transferred home after a traumatizing combat mission, a trained French soldier uses her lethal skills to hunt down the man who hurt her sister.

name: Magnificent Obsession
summary_text: A rich playboy whose recklessness inadvertently causes the death of a prominent doctor tries to make amends to his widow, and falls for her in the process.

name: Omen IV: The Awakening
summary_text: Two attorneys adopt a mysterious orphan girl as their daughter, unaware she is the new Antichrist, next in line from Damien Thorn.

name: Reincarnation
summary_text: A Japanese actress begins having strange visions and experiences after landing a role in a horror film about a real-life murder spree that took place over forty years ago.

name: Light Sleeper
summary_text: A drug dealer reconsiders his profession when his boss plans to go straight and an old flame reappears.

name: Tigers Are Not Afraid
summary_text: A dark fairy tale about a gang of five children trying to survive the horrific violence of the cartels and the ghosts created every day by the drug war.

name: Killer of Sheep
summary_text: Set in the Watts area of Los Angeles, a slaughterhouse worker must suspend his emotions to continue working at a job he finds repugnant, and then he finds he has little sensitivity for the family he works so hard to support.

name: Terminus
summary_text: Following a near-fatal accident, David Chamberlain makes an unprecedented discovery that will not only determine the fate of his family, but of mankind.

name: Finding Fanny
summary_text: A man embarks on a road trip to find his lost love.

name: The Amateurs
summary_text: Citizens of a small town, under the influence of a man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, come together to make an adult film.

name: The Mule
summary_text: After a trip to Thailand, a first-time drug mule finds himself in police custody, with his stomach crammed with narcotics. Now, he has to endure seven sphincter-clenching days to convince them of his innocence. Will nature take its course?

name: Water Drops on Burning Rocks
summary_text: In 1970s Germany, a 50-year-old businessman falls in love with a 20-year-old man.
Two university students, Jule and Jan, leave Berlin together in an old camper on a road trip south, but for different reasons.

name: Imaginaerum
summary_text: A coma sends an old man into his childhood's sinister fantasy world, where he must fight dementia and gain back his memories before it's too late.

name: The Clinic
summary_text: While traveling across country with her fiancé, Beth wakes alone in an isolated clinic to find her unborn baby has been removed. Just how far will she go to get her child back?

name: The Man Who Laughs
summary_text: When a proud noble refuses to kiss the hand of the despotic King James in 1690, he is cruelly executed and his son surgically disfigured.

name: Aimee & Jaguar
summary_text: In 1943 Berlin, a Nazi officer's wife meets and starts a passionate affair with a Jewish woman.

name: Sawdust and Tinsel
summary_text: The complicated relationships between a circus ringmaster, his estranged wife and his lover.

name: Lucy in the Sky
summary_text: Astronaut Lucy Cola returns to Earth after a transcendent experience during a mission to space, and begins to lose touch with reality in a world that now seems too small.

name: Somers Town
summary_text: A black-and-white study of a social environment in London, concentrating on a pair of unlikely new friends and the girl they both fancy.

name: Highway
summary_text: After Jack gets caught with a Vegas mobster's wife in bed, he's gotta hit the road. Jack's best friend Pilot accompanies him, and the pair sets out on an adventure akin to Kerouac's "On the Road".

name: Krabat
summary_text: A boy learns the black arts from an evil sorcerer.

name: Over the Edge
summary_text: A group of bored teenagers rebel against authority in the community of New Granada after the death of one of their own.

name: The Class of Chaos Goes Abroad
summary_text: Hababam Sinifi is back. 1980s, naughty and mischievous students together again.

name: Send Me No Flowers
summary_text: A hypochondriac believes he is dying and makes plans for his wife which she discovers and misunderstands.

name: Smosh: The Movie
summary_text: An embarrassing video of Anthony surfaces online right before his fifth high school reunion. The Smosh dudes then take a portal into YouTube and race to change the video and re-write history before it blows Anthony's chances of reconnecting with his teen crush Anna.

name: Pandora
summary_text: The explosion of a nuclear power plant caused by an earthquake leads to a disaster which no one other than its workers can stop from spreading further.

name: Gwang-hae, wang-i doin nam-ja
summary_text: A look-alike commoner is secretly hired to take the place of a poisoned king to save his country from falling into chaos.

name: Magical Girl
summary_text: The father of a terminally ill girl is determined to grant his daughter's last wish, a ridiculously expensive collectors' costume from a Japanese TV series. The request will drive him into a journey within his city's dark underbelly.

name: Einstein and Eddington
summary_text: Drama about the development of Albert Einstein's theory of general relativity, and Einstein's relationship with British scientist Sir Arthur Eddington, the first physicist to experimentally prove his ideas.

name: James White
summary_text: James, a twenty-something New Yorker, struggles to take control of his self-destructive behavior in the face of momentous family challenges.

name: Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice
summary_text: A light-hearted picture of middle-aged love and friendship.

name: Oscar
summary_text: Neurotic businessman must find the right man for his pregnant daughter. In fact, it is little bit complicated.

name: Vedalam
summary_text: A doting brother who works as a cab driver tries to hunt down three notorious criminals in Kolkata who had harmed his sister.

name: Pelli Choopulu
summary_text: A wannabe businesswoman and a happy-go-lucky guy meet each other during an arranged marriage blind date but eventually team up to start a food truck on their own.

name: Suddenly
summary_text: In the city of Suddenly, three gangsters trap the Benson family in their own house, on the top of a hill nearby the railroad station, with the intention of killing the president of the USA.

name: Don't Bother to Knock
summary_text: After being dumped by his girlfriend, an airline pilot pursues a babysitter in his hotel and gradually realizes she's dangerous.

name: Captain Horatio Hornblower
summary_text: During the Napoleonic wars, a British Navy Captain has adventures in Central American waters.

name: 3 Generations
summary_text: After Ray decides to transition from female to male, Ray's mother, Maggie, must come to terms with the decision while tracking down Ray's biological father to get his legal consent.

name: Killing Bono
summary_text: Two brothers attempt to become global rock stars but can only look on as old school friends U2 become the biggest band in the world.

name: The Undefeated
summary_text: After the Civil War, ex-Confederate soldiers heading for a new life in Mexico run into ex-Union cavalrymen selling horses to the Mexican government but they must join forces to fight off Mexican bandits and revolutionaries.

name: The Trigger Effect
summary_text: A blackout leaves those affected to consider what is necessary, what is legal, and what is questionable, in order to survive in a predatory environment.

name: A Whisker Away
summary_text: Miyo Sasaki is in love with her classmate Kento Hinode and tries repeatedly to get Kento's attention by transforming into a cat, but at some point, the boundary between herself and the cat becomes ambiguous.

name: Mumbai Saga
summary_text: The plot of the movie is set in the era of the 80s and 90s which were marked as a transformed period of Mumbai.

name: Jiu Jitsu
summary_text: Every six years, an ancient order of jiu-jitsu fighters joins forces to battle a vicious race of alien invaders. But when a celebrated war hero goes down in defeat, the fate of the planet and mankind hangs in the balance.

name: Silent Light
summary_text: In a Mennonite community in Mexico, a father's faith is tested when he falls in love with a new woman.

name: The Troops on Vacation
summary_text: The entire squad of gendarmes from Saint-Tropez has been retired. But there is no such power that could stop them from protecting the law and public order.

name: Bad Moon
summary_text: After being bitten by a werewolf in the jungle, Ted looks for a cure. His lawyer sister, with a son and dog, invites him to park his camper by her house in the woods and live out of her fridge.

name: Darling
summary_text: Beautiful but amoral model Diana Scott sleeps her way to the top of the London fashion scene at the height of the Swinging Sixties.

name: Kill Zone 2
summary_text: While undercover officer Kit is taken prisoner by the syndicate, he befriends his keeper and discovers an organ trafficking ring.

name: The Morning After
summary_text: A washed up, alcoholic actress who is prone to blackouts wakes up next to a murdered man. Did she kill him and, if not, is she in danger?

name: My Little Pony: The Movie
summary_text: After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland.

name: A Bucket of Blood
summary_text: A dim-witted busboy finds acclaim as an artist for a plaster-covered dead cat that is mistaken as a skillful statuette. The desire for more praise soon leads to an increasingly deadly series of works.

name: Year of the Dog
summary_text: A secretary's life changes in unexpected ways after her dog dies.

name: Gett
summary_text: After a lukewarm marriage of over twenty years, a woman appeals to her husband's compassion to obtain the desirable divorce document in front of a court, which proves to be more challenging than she would expect.

name: Mulan: Rise of a Warrior
summary_text: The epic story of the Chinese girl-warrior, Mulan, who fights to defend her father.

name: The Sense of an Ending
summary_text: A man becomes haunted by his past and is presented with a mysterious legacy that causes him to re-think his current situation in life.

name: Rogue
summary_text: O'Hara is a mercenary leading a squad of soldiers on their mission to rescue hostages in remote part of Africa. Unfortunately the mission goes wrong and the team are stranded, forced to survive against the local rebels.

name: Janatha Garage
summary_text: An environmental activist comes to Hyderabad to attend a seminar, where an unexpected encounter with a man who runs an organization for the oppressed, changes his purpose in life.

name: 10th & Wolf
summary_text: A former street tough returns to his Philadelphia home after a stint in the military. Back on his home turf, he once again finds himself tangling with the mob boss who was instrumental in his going off to be a soldier.

name: The Seventh Victim
summary_text: A woman in search of her missing sister uncovers a Satanic cult in New York's Greenwich Village, and finds that they may have something to do with her sibling's random disappearance.

name: Hurricane Bianca
summary_text: A New York teacher, who moves to small town Texas where he's fired for being gay, returns disguised as a mean lady to get revenge on the nasty town.

name: 13B: Fear Has a New Address
summary_text: A man experiences a supernatural occurrence at his newly purchased apartment; a soap opera being telecast exclusively on his TV, which shows the future of his family.

name: John Rabe
summary_text: A true-story account of a German businessman who saved more than 200,000 Chinese during the Nanjing massacre in 1937-38.

name: Broken English
summary_text: Since college (art), Nora hasn't had luck with men. Now in her 30s, she works in a NYC hotel going nowhere. But then she meets a Frenchman.

name: Bizim Aile
summary_text: A love story between a poor man and a rich girl. The rich girl's father tries to prevent their marriage and he declares a war against the poor boy's family.

name: Train
summary_text: In Europe, a group of American college athletes unknowingly board a train that will become one deadly ride.

name: Three Kingdoms
summary_text: Based on "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" by Luo Guangzhong. It ranks as one of China's four most important pieces of literature.

name: The Wind
summary_text: A frail young woman from the east moves in with her cousin in the west, where she causes tension within the family and is slowly driven mad.

name: Anonyma - Eine Frau in Berlin
summary_text: A woman tries to survive the invasion of Berlin by the Soviet troops during the last days of World War II.

name: Michael the Brave
summary_text: At the end of the 16th century Wallachian ruler Prince Michael the Brave overcame the adversity of the Ottoman and Austrian Empires to unite Wallachia, Moldavia and Transylvania into one country.

name: Kill, Baby... Kill!
summary_text: A Carpathian village is haunted by the ghost of a murderous little girl, prompting a coroner and a medical student to uncover her secrets while a witch attempts to protect the villagers.

name: V
summary_text: An action-thriller centered on the showdown between a celebrated cop and a serial killer who challenges the former to nab him.

name: Jack Brooks: Monster Slayer
summary_text: A troubled young man still mourning the childhood loss of his family now has to deal with his professor being turned into a monster.

name: My Father's Glory
summary_text: At the end of the nineteenth century, little Marcel lives with his parents in the Provence countryside. During his holiday, Marcel meets Lili, a local boy who knows all the secrets of the hills, and the two become fast friends.

name: Maharshi
summary_text: Rishi, a millionaire businessman, returns to his homeland, where he becomes the champion of poor and downtrodden farmers.

name: Deceiver
summary_text: A hooker is found cut in two. Two cops give polygraph tests to the only suspect, James Wayland (Tim Roth), an unstable genius. After some time, the roles change.

name: Xtro
summary_text: An alien creature impregnates a woman who gives birth to a man that was abducted by aliens three years ago. The man reconnects with his wife and son for a sinister purpose.

name: 55 Days at Peking
summary_text: During the 1900 Boxer Rebellion, U.S. marine, Maj. Matt Lewis, along with British consul, Sir Arthur Robertson, develop a plan to keep the rebels at bay until an international military relief force can arrive.

name: Serious Men
summary_text: Tormented with his 'under-privileged' societal status, a father capitalizes on his son's newfound fame as a boy-genius. Little does he realize that the secret he harbors will destroy the very thing he loves the most.

name: The Clan of the Cave Bear
summary_text: A young Cro-Magnon woman is raised by Neanderthals.

name: Enchanted April
summary_text: Four English women, after World War I, who are unhappy with their lives, and their time away on vacation in a beautiful Italian villa.

name: Get Duked!
summary_text: An anarchic, hip-hop inspired comedy that follows four city boys on a wilderness trek as they try to escape a mysterious huntsman.

name: A Merry Friggin' Christmas
summary_text: Boyd Mitchler and his family must spend Christmas with his estranged family of misfits. Upon realizing that he left all his son's gifts at home, he hits the road with his dad in an attempt to make the 8-hour round trip before sunrise.

name: Harrison's Flowers
summary_text: When a Newsweek photojournalist disappears in war-torn Yugoslavia, his wife travels to Europe to find him.

name: Blood Feast
summary_text: An Egyptian caterer kills various women in suburban Miami to use their body parts to bring to life a dormant Egyptian goddess, while an inept police detective tries to track him down.

name: Bro's Before Ho's
summary_text: Two brothers have their friendship put to the test when they both fall in love with the same girl.

name: Alien Outpost
summary_text: A documentary crew follows an elite unit of soldiers in the wake of an alien invasion.

name: Nocturne
summary_text: An incredibly gifted pianist makes a Faustian bargain to overtake her older sister at a prestigious institution for classical musicians.

name: Red Zone Cuba
summary_text: Escaped convict Griffin and his friends ran all the way to Hell...with a penny, and a broken cigarette.

name: The Terror Live
summary_text: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

name: All Is Bright
summary_text: While out on parole, Dennis reluctantly takes a job selling Christmas trees with his old buddy Rene in order to make enough money to buy his estranged daughter the piano she's always wanted.

name: Tormented
summary_text: A bullied teenager comes back from the dead to take revenge on his classmates.

name: Mississippi Mermaid
summary_text: A wealthy plantation owner is captivated by a mysterious woman with a shady past.

name: Stromboli
summary_text: Karin, a young woman from the Baltic countries, marries fisherman Antonio to escape from a prison camp. But she cannot get used to the tough life in Antonio's volcano-threatened village, Stromboli.

name: One Piece Film Z
summary_text: A former Marine stands in the way of the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: The Glass Agency
summary_text: The Glass Agency is the story of a war veteran living in post war Iran. It depicts veterans who are suffering from social problems after the war. Society does not understand them and the ...                See full summary »

name: Confidentially Yours
summary_text: Claude Massoulier is murdered while hunting at the same place as Julien Vercel, an estate agent who knew him and whose fingerprints are found on Massoulier's car. As the police discovers ...                See full summary »

name: Eu cand vreau sa fluier, fluier
summary_text: Two weeks before his release, a teenage prisoner learns that his mother has returned home. Meanwhile, he finds himself in love with a student working in the penitentiary as an intern.

name: Ladies in Black
summary_text: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies in Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
summary_text: A small-town band hits it big, but they must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

name: Trick or Treat
summary_text: A bullied teenage boy is devastated after the death of his heavy metal idol, Sammi Curr. But as Hallowe'en night approaches, he discovers that he may be the only one who can stop Sammi from making a Satanic comeback from beyond the grave.

name: All Hallows' Eve
summary_text: A babysitter finds a VHS tape which features various sinister murders performed by a psychotic clown.

name: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla
summary_text: An Okinawan prophecy appears to foretell Earth's destruction at the hands of Godzilla, only for the true Godzilla to reveal his doppelganger as a mechanical alien weapon.

name: Godzilla 1985
summary_text: Thirty years after the original monster's rampage, a new Godzilla emerges and attacks Japan.

name: Manifesto
summary_text: Cate Blanchett performs manifestos as a series of striking monologues.

name: The Blood of a Poet
summary_text: A young artist draws a face at a canvas on his easel. Suddenly the mouth on the drawing comes into life and starts talking. The artist tries to wipe it away with his hand, but when he looks...                See full summary »
